completion.contributor.order: before javaMemberName, before javaLegacy, after liveTemplates
last, before legacy, before default, before javaClassName

localInspection.displayName: Instance member guarded by static field
Static member guarded by instance field or this
Explicit type can be replaced with <>
Anonymous type can be replaced with lambda
foreach loop can be collapsed with stream api
Anonymous type can be replaced with method reference
Lambda can be replaced with method reference
Statement lambda can be replaced with expression lambda
Possible heap pollution from parameterized vararg type
Class may extend a commonly used base class instead of implementing interface
